title: How do I hire a React Native developer?
body: To hire a React Native Developer from Uplers, you have to follow simple steps starting from sharing the level of experience and expertise of the candidates you need, and we will shortlist the top matching ones for you. You interview them and onboard the ones you want to hire.

title: What does a React Native developer do?
body: A React Native developer is responsible for building Android, Android TV, iOS, macOS, tvOS, Web, Windows and UWP based apps.

title: How much does it cost to hire a react native developer through Uplers?
body: The cost of hiring a dedicated React Native developer through Uplers depends on the expertise and experience of the developer you need. Typically, the cost to hire starts from $25 an hour.

title: Why choose react native for mobile app development?
body: One should choose React Native for mobile app development as it uses the same Javascript library as that of React to build cross-platform mobile apps. Moreover, it gives you the look and feel of native apps for specific mobile OS, including Android and iOS.

title: Do you provide a trial period for hiring a react native developer?
body: Yes, we offer a 40 hours no-risk trial, wherein you can test the resource before actually deciding to hire them.
